#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define r(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
int main()
{
	long long t;
	r(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n,min_s,min_rip,s,rip,a_cut,r_cut=0;
		r(n);r(min_s);r(min_rip);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			r(s);r(rip);
			if(s>min_s || rip>min_rip)
			r_cut++;
		}
		r(a_cut);
		long long x=__gcd(a_cut,r_cut);
		cout<<(r_cut/x)<<"/"<<(a_cut/x)<<endl;
	}
}
